message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit high for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
I understand that $110 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for it.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $102.
I appreciate your concession, but $102 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $99 for it.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $100. I can offer it to you for $100.50, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to pay $99.50 for the product.
